item.description:
This will be a joint even with the newly minted Cambridge Singles Meetup that Katelyn is assistant organizing AND the Red Sox Natives Meetup! WOOHOO!

The Sox are taking on the Yanks in the first of a 2 game series (away game). The Celtics game might be on as well, since it's their last home game of the season. The Mad Raven has a bunch of TV's and as a bonus, a large pull down screen!
Please email me with any questions.

http://www.themadrave...
http://boston.redsox....
item.how_to_find_us: Katelyn and I will be wearing lei's. Yes, I know, cheesy, but the only thing I could think of to find us!
item.why: You're a Sox fan (or a Yankees fan, we don't discriminate here!)
item.name: Joint Event: Watch the Sox take on the Yanks!
